DOC.brief_summary: A single-arm trial demonstrate Depo-SubQ Provera inject upper arm adequate effective contraception
DOC.brief_title: PK Depo SubQ Injected Upper Arm
DOC.detailed_description: A single-arm trial demonstrate blood level medroxyprogesterone acetate adequate effective contraception Depo-SubQ Provera 104 inject upper arm
DOC.criteria: Age 1840 negative pregnancy test day injection wish become pregnant next 12 month negligible risk pregnancy ( e.g . sterilize , exclusively samegender partnership , monogamous relationship vasectomize partner , abstinent , use nonhormonal IUD ) body mass index 1830
